clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in various forms of brain cancer Malignant Glioma Glioblastoma Multiforme GBM Anaplastic Astrocytoma Oligo Astrocytoma Gliosarcoma

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: As a synthetic version of a neurotoxin isolated from the venom of the Giant Yellow Israeli scorpion Leiurus Quinquestriatus TM 601 is a small 36 amino acid peptide that has been manufactured and covalently linked to iodine 131 131 I TM 601 Its unique binding to gliomal cells makes it a unique means of targeting radiation to tumor cells in the treatment of brain cancer
